item.title: {508} How To Show Players Head on ChatboxInterface! {508}
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

  1. Intro.
    hello, after playing many {private} servers like tokkulscape, mithscape and davidscape, i have noticed that there aren’t alot of people that use server making at its full capacity.
    therefore i am going to show you how to make your characters face show on the chatboxInterface screen when in a conversation.
    this will not only look better, you will get alot moe the feeling of playing a good server.

  2. Lets Cut The Crap Please.

now for those ppl that dont want to hear alot of crap here it is:

else
if(p.Dialogue == XXX) {
p.Dialogue = XXX;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 242);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9780, 242, 2);
p.frames.setPlayerHead(p, 242, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “” + p.username + “”, 242, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 242, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 242, 5);
}

Put this in packetmanager.java
and replace the XXX with the Dialogue of the NPCOption.java Dialogue that you used with the npc
and final in the last 2 strings that show “” put here the things you want your player to say.

hope i helped.

DemonWars

Read full topic
item.source: {508} How To Show Players Head on ChatboxInterface! {508}
